description: Assign clump or pebble surface properties used in contact models. Properties are surface conditions (e.g., stiffness, friction) distinct from clump attributes (position, velocity). Property names depend on the active contact model. Pebble properties are applied to all pebbles in the clump. See Contact Models documentation for available properties per model.
notes: Pebble properties are surface properties that are used to fill contact model properties
These are distinct from clump attributes (modified with clump attribute command) that are characteristics of clumps, such as position or size
Properties are applied to pebbles within the clump
The list of mechanical contact models is given in the Contact Models documentation section
Be aware of the distinction between attributes and properties! See tutorial 'Attributes and Properties' for details

examples.description: Set normal stiffness to 1e6 for all clump pebbles (linear contact model)
Set normal stiffness, shear stiffness, and friction coefficient for all clump pebbles
Set friction coefficient for pebbles in clumps of group 'aggregate'
Set parallel bond properties for pebbles in clumps 1-100

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: For pebbles: iterate over clumps, then over pebbles (balls) in each clump, and use Ball.set_prop(property_name, value). Example: for c in itasca.clump.list(): for p in c.pebbles(): p.set_prop('kn', 1e8)
